title: Bullied Mate
description: He bullied me until he broke me. But I don’t remember him because I have amnesia…I couldn’t shift and was the outcast of the pack. He tormented me relentlessly.I managed to escape him and locked my memories away. But now we meet again.He’s a single dad now, and irritatingly hot. But slowly, my memories are coming back to me…I don’t know why I dislike him so much. Something tells me to stay away from him.But I can’t, because the pack is forcing me to work on a project with him.And so I try to resist him until I’m exhausted and let him take control of me.He does what he wants to me until the memories start flooding back.He used to use me for pleasure, and now he’s doing it again.He bullied me back then, and he’s bullying me now.I want to leave this small town, but he says he wants to teach me a lesson.And no matter how much I hate myself for it, I can only give in.Can I surrender my all to my bully?In this mysterious small town, humans and paranormal creatures alike push through the darkness until enemies turn into lovers, rejected mates get second chances, and above all, love prevails…
author: Layla Silver
